caption:
Everything that doesn’t contribute to my goal in Paris I push aside.” That’s the unwavering resilience and determination of @leongabriel.s . Despite being diagnosed with bone cancer at the age of 13 which resulted in his leg being amputated below the thigh, Léon has emerged as one of the top para athletes. Let’s unite in cheering for Léon Schäfer as he pursues his dreams and inspires others along the way.

#TeamBayer #BayerSport #RoadToParis
